movies.title: Raped by an Angel 4: The Raper's Union
movies.originalTitle: Qiang jian zhong ji pian: Zui hou gao yang
movies.plot: Miss Kwan a writer with writer's block and her goofy cop boyfriend are being tormented by an American named Daniel who's housing two escaped rapists. Daniel and the two friends spend there time combing the bars and clubs looking for girls. They cross paths with Kwan and her friends and the madness and carnage begins. Anthony Wong also stars as a lunatic named the Human Milk Drinking Doctor. A madman who rapes lactating women. He's reformed though (through working as an projectionist in a porno theater). Wong helps the couple defeat Daniel and his co-horts.
movies.simplePlot: Miss Kwan, a writer and her goofy cop boyfriend are being tormented by a rapist named Daniel.

biography.bio: Nick Cheung was born on December 2, 1967 in Hong Kong as Cheung Ka Fei. He is an actor and director, known for Unbeatable (2013), The Stool Pigeon (2010) and Election (2005). He has been married to Esther Kwan since December 8, 2003. They have one child.
biography.name: Nick Cheung

biography.bio: Suki Kwan was born on March 11, 1966 in Hong Kong, China. She is an actress, known for The Legend of Drunken Master (1994), High Risk (1995) and Colour of the Loyalty (2005).
biography.name: Suki Kwan

biography.bio: Athena Chu was born on October 25, 1971 in Hong Kong as Chu Yan. She is an actress, known for Le roi singe 2 - Cendrillon (1995), Whispers and Moans (2007) and Chinese Odyssey 2002 (2002). She has been married to Goon Chung Wong since 2012. They have one child.
biography.name: Athena Chu

biography.bio: Ben Ng was born as Choi-Nam Ng. He is an actor, known for Eastern Heroes (1991), Nan yang shi da xie shu (1995) and Hong tian long (1991).
biography.name: Ben Ng

biography.birthName: Anthony Perry (English name) Chau-Sang Wong (Chinese Name)
biography.bio: Anthony Wong Chau-Sang was born to a British father and a Chinese mother. He never knew his father, since the man left his family when Wong was four years old. He trained acting at ATV and later enrolled into the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts. After working in several TV Series, he shot to stardom with hits such as "Hard-Boiled" and his Golden Horse-winning performance in the horrific "The Untold Story." He later appeared in the "Young and Dangerous" films as Dai Fei, a friend to Ekin Cheng's Ho Nam. In 1995, he made his directorial debut with New Tenant. He won his second Hong Kong Film Award for his role as the corrupt police officer Tung in the critically acclaimed "Beast Cops" (1998). Wong continued his success in supporting roles in films such as "Infernal Affairs" (2002) and "Initial D" (2005).
biography.name: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong

biography.bio: King-Tan Yuen was born on September 11, 1962 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Lai-King Yuen. She is an actress, known for Wing Chun (1994), Last Hero in China (1993) and Un couple explosif (1992).
biography.name: King-Tan Yuen

biography.bio: Sherming Yiu was born on September 23, 1973 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Yiu Lok Yee. She is known for her work on Gui qing ni di hu (1999), A Lamb in Despair (1999) and Geng tin daai chaak wong (1998).
biography.name: Sherming Yiu

biography.bio: Fan Yeung is an actress, known for Chinese Torture Chamber Story 2 (1998), Raped by an Angel 2: The Uniform Fan (1998) and The Deadly Camp (1999).
biography.name: Fan Yeung

biography.bio: Chi On Leung is an actor and assistant director, known for The Myth (2005), Chinese Box (1997) and Bullets Over Summer (1999).
biography.name: Chi On Leung

biography.bio: Fat Man is an actor, known for Raped by an Angel 4: The Raper's Union (1999).
biography.name: Fat Man

biography.bio: Chingmy Yau was born on May 16, 1968 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Naked Killer (1992), The New Legend of Shaolin (1994) and High Risk (1995). She has been married to Karwai Shum since October 31, 1999. They have three children.
biography.name: Chingmy Yau

biography.bio: Ankle Leung is an actor, known for Raped by an Angel 4: The Raper's Union (1999).
biography.name: Ankle Leung

biography.bio: Tin-Bo Tam is an actress, known for Unbeatable (2013), Hitman (1998) and Running on Karma (2003).
biography.name: Tin-Bo Tam
